00020 #ifndef _DttArrayFileReader_HEADER_
00021 #define _DttArrayFileReader_HEADER_

00023 /*! \file DttArrayFileReader.h This file provides interfaces to read an array file generated by the DTT1.1 software.
00024  *
00025  * The Dtt array file is the MAGE-ML file generated by the DTT 1.1 software.
00026  */
00027 
00028 #include <cstring>
00029 #include <list>
00030 #include <string>
00031 //
00032 
00033 namespace affymetrix_dttarray
00034 {
00035 
00036 /*! The parameter name for the gcos sample name. */
00037 #define GCOS_SAMPLE_NAME_PARAMETER_NAME "GCOS Sample Name"
00038 
00039 /*! The parameter name for the gcos sample type. */
00040 #define GCOS_SAMPLE_TYPE_PARAMETER_NAME "GCOS Sample Type"
00041 
00042 /*! The parameter name for the gcos sample project. */
00043 #define GCOS_SAMPLE_PROJECT_PARAMETER_NAME "GCOS Sample Project"
00044 
00045 /*! A structure to hold an attribute name/value/type. */
00046 typedef struct _AttributeNameValueType
00047 {
00048         /*! The attribute name. */
00049         std::string name;
00050 
00051         /*! The attribute value. */
00052         std::string value;
00053 
00054         /*! The attribute type. */
00055         std::string type;
00056 
00057 } AttributeNameValueType;
00058 
00059 /*! An STL list of attributes. */
00060 typedef std::list<AttributeNameValueType> AttributeNameValueTypeList;
00061 
00062 /*! This class provides storage of the DTT array file data. */
00063 class DttArrayData
00064 {
00065 private:
00066         /*! The probe array type. */
00067         std::string arrayType;
00068 
00069         /*! The experiment name. */
00070         std::string expName;
00071 
00072         /*! The attributes. */
00073         AttributeNameValueTypeList attributes;
00074 
00075 public:
00076         /*! Constructor */
00077         DttArrayData();
00078 
00079         /*! Destructor */
00080         ~DttArrayData();
00081 
00082         /*! Gets the probe array type name.
00083          * @return The probe array type.
00084          */
00085         std::string GetArrayType() const { return arrayType; }
00086 
00087         /*! Sets the probe array type name.
00088          * @param aType The array type.
00089          */
00090         void SetArrayType(std::string const &aType) { arrayType = aType; }
00091 
00092         /*! Gets the experiemnt name.
00093          * @return The experiment name.
00094          */
00095         std::string GetExperimentName() const { return expName; }
00096 
00097         /*! Sets the experiment name.
00098          * @param name The experiment name.
00099          */
00100         void SetExperimentName(std::string const &name) { expName = name; }
00101 
00102         /*! Gets the attributes.
00103          * @return The sample and experiemnt attributes.
00104          */
00105         AttributeNameValueTypeList &Attributes() { return attributes; }
00106 
00107         /*! Clears the members. */
00108         void Clear();
00109 };
00110 
00111 /*! This class provides interfaces to read an array file. */
00112 class DttArrayFileReader
00113 {
00114 protected:
00115         /*! The full path name to the DTT array file. */
00116         std::string m_FileName;
00117 
00118 public:
00119         /*! Constructor */
00120         DttArrayFileReader();
00121 
00122         /*! Destructor */
00123         ~DttArrayFileReader();
00124 
00125         /*! Gets the file name.
00126          * @return The full path of the array file.
00127          */
00128         std::string GetFileName() const { return m_FileName; }
00129 
00130         /*! Sets the file name.
00131          * @param file The full path of the array file.
00132          */
00133         void SetFileName(const char *file) { m_FileName = file; }
00134 
00135         /*! Reads the entire contents of the array file.
00136          * @param arrayData The array data to read from the file.
00137          * @return True if successfully read.
00138          */
00139         bool Read(DttArrayData &arrayData);
00140 
00141         /*! Checks for the existance of the file.
00142          * @return True if the file exists.
00143          */
00144         bool Exists();
00145 };
00146 
00147 };
